author: arkurth
msg: Added a new file called phpmyadmin.sql to the mysql directory. This file can be imported into the phpmyadmin database if phpMyAdmin is used to access the VCL database. It adds rows to the pma_table_info table in the phpmyadmin database. These rows cause the corresponding values to appear when the mouse hovers over them if the column is linked to another column via a constraint.
These columns are added when you manually configure the "Choose field to display" value for a table:

author: fguillaume
